module.name: product_structure_and_classification
module.keywords: module, individual, class, product, library, structure, process plant

purpose.P: The Product structure and classification application module supports the requirement to record:

UL.LI: individual products with their whole-part, connection, containment and involvement in connection relationships;
a library of classes of product with their whole-part, connection, containment and involvement in connection relationships;
the classification of an individual product as a member of a class of product, and the classification of a relationship between individual products as a member of a class of relationship; and
the specification of the complete membership for a class of product or a class of relationship between products.

LI.P: the existence of an individual product;
a whole-part relationship between two individual products;
a connection relationship between two individual products;
a containment relationship between two individual products;
an involvement of a individual product in a connection between individual products;
the existence of a class of product;
a mapping between one class of product and another that indicates the nature of a whole-part relationship between two individual products;
A mapping between classes of product is a class that has relationships between individual products as members.
a mapping between one class of product and another that indicates the nature of a connection relationship between two individual products;
a mapping between one class of product and another that indicates the nature of a containment relationship between two individual products;
set theory relationships, such as subset, union and intersection, between classes of product and between mappings;
the classification of an individual product as a member of a class of product;
the classification of a relationship between individual products as a member of a mapping;
the specification of the complete membership of a class of product or of a mapping between classes of product.

note.P: Product structure and classification is within the scope of the Activity_structure_and_classification application module.

LI.P: assignment of a property to an individual product or class of product.

note.P: The assignment of a property to an individual activity or class of activity is within the scope of the Property_and_property_assignment application module.
